validations.field-error-max-value: Must be less than or equal to {{max}}

network-warning-modal.title: Where are you?
network-warning-modal.description: Don’t get lost! Please switch to {{chainName}} to continue

install-metamask-modal.title: Install Metamask
install-metamask-modal.description: To create a poll and embark on a journey into decentralized, anonymous voting, you need a wallet. Please install it to get started!

errors.network-error: Something wrong with network request, please try again later
errors.unknown-error: Oops, something went wrong, please try again later
errors.bad-request: Your request does not pass our server validation, please check your input
errors.unauthorized: Seems like you are not authorized to perform this action
errors.forbidden: Seems like you are not allowed to do this
errors.not-found: Our service cannot find the resource you are looking for
errors.conflict: It seems like there is a conflict with the current state of the resource
errors.too-many-requests: Wow-wow, slow down, you are making too many requests
errors.internal-server-error: Ahh, something went wrong on our side, please try again later
errors.service-unavailable: Oh, it seems like our service is not available right now, please try again later
errors.user-rejected-request: Oh, seems like you rejected the request
errors.resource-unavailable: Hmm, check out your wallet, seems like the request is pending
errors.not-enough-for-proposal: You don't have enough balance to allocate this number of votes

notifications.default-message-warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
notifications.default-message-info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that

auth-block.title: Connect your wallet
auth-block.description: To create a poll, you need to authenticate using a wallet.

create-poll.end-date-error: End Date must be after Start Date
create-poll.success-msg: You have successfully created a poll!
create-poll.max-age-error: Max age should be greater or equal than min age
create-poll.show-poll-option-description-1: The results will be available to participants during the voting
create-poll.show-poll-option-description-2: The results will be shown only after the voting ends
create-poll.fee-alert: Voting day fees will fluctuate with network congestion, but no worries – you can always top up gas as more voters show up.

processing-modal.progress-description: Your poll is being created, please don’t close this tab
processing-modal.live-description: Poll created! Share the QR code so participants can scan and vote.

signature-confirmation-modal.title: Signature Confirmation
signature-confirmation-modal.description: Please confirm your signature to complete the operation. This is required to ensure the security of the transaction.

check-vote.helper-text_one: You need {{currencyAmount}} {{currency}} to cast one more vote.

polls.no-polls-description: You haven't created a poll yet.

hero.title-1: You will not find a solution to political problems in cryptography.
hero.title-2: > yes, but we can win a major battle in the arms race and gain a new territory of freedom...

how-it-works.title: How it works
how-it-works.guide-2-list-item-1: Users scan a QR code to instantly download a polling app
how-it-works.guide-2-list-item-2: Tap a passport to anonymously prove age and citizenship
how-it-works.guide-2-list-item-3: User data stays on the device, only a zero-knowledge proof is generated
how-it-works.guide-3-footer: All results are stored on the blockchain – secure, tamper-proof, and transparent. Voting data is protected from manipulation, while voter identities remain completely anonymous.

case-studies.case-1-description: The United Space app, initiated by Georgian opposition activists, aims to facilitate tools for liquid democracy. It offers anonymous polls for Georgian citizens, digital versions of government documents, and tokenization of state assets.
case-studies.case-1-link-1-tite: Georgia opposition debuts civil blockchain project ahead of critical...
case-studies.case-1-link-2-title: How a Georgian opposition party is putting blockchain on the ballot
case-studies.case-2-description: Russia2024 provides a democratic alternative to the 2024 Russian presidential election. The Russia2024 app aims to establish parallel government structures to promote democracy, freedom, and peace in Russia.
case-studies.case-2-link-1-title: Exiled Russian opposition leader Mark Feygin is launching an anonymou...
case-studies.case-2-link-2-title: Pussy Riot lawyer launches blockchain-based poll to challenge legitimacy of Russian elections
case-studies.case-3-description: Launched by Iranian dissidents it enables citizens to protest the presidential election safely. It allows users to cast a vote of no confidence in the Islamic Republic of Iran's presidential candidates and its corrupt electoral system.
case-studies.case-3-link-title: Blockchain voting from Iranians Vote and Freedom Tool
case-studies.title: Case studies
